subject: Concussions
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s disciplinarian, Brendan Shanahan, who played for 20 years in the league, stands by the suspensions he meted out during the first round of the playoffs.
snippet: The N.H.L.’s disciplinarian, Brendan Shanahan, who played for 20 years in the league, stands by the suspensions he meted out during the first round of the playoffs.
